languages.text: "Тем хуже — вы допускаете, чтобы простые подданные Бога-Императора переступали границу дозволенного и унижали себя якшанием с опасными врагами Человечества".
"Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Тем хуже — вы допускаете, чтобы простые подданные Бога-Императора переступали границу дозволенного и унижали себя якшанием с опасными врагами Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

traits.locale_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

traits.locale_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

traits.locale_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

traits.locale_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « Pire encore, vous laissez des sujets ordinaires de l'Empereur-Dieu outrepasser les normes établies et pactiser avec de dangereux ennemis de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « Pire encore, vous laissez des sujets ordinaires de l'Empereur-Dieu outrepasser les normes établies et pactiser avec de dangereux ennemis de l'humanité. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「もっと酷い。あなたは神帝陛下の普通の臣下が確立された一線を越えて、非常に危険な人類の敵と付き合うことを許している」
languages.original_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「もっと酷い。あなたは神帝陛下の普通の臣下が確立された一線を越えて、非常に危険な人類の敵と付き合うことを許している」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: “除此之外，你甚至还任由自己越过既定的界限。你只不过是神皇的普通臣民，却与极其危险的人类之敌沆瀣一气，允许他们担任你的随从。”
languages.original_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “除此之外，你甚至还任由自己越过既定的界限。你只不过是神皇的普通臣民，却与极其危险的人类之敌沆瀣一气，允许他们担任你的随从。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Schlimmer noch. Ihr gestattet gewöhnlichen Untertanen des Gottimperators, die etablierte Grenze zu überqueren und sich dazu herabzulassen, mit höchst gefährlichen Feinden der Menschheit zusammenzuarbeiten."
languages.original_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Schlimmer noch. Ihr gestattet gewöhnlichen Untertanen des Gottimperators, die etablierte Grenze zu überqueren und sich dazu herabzulassen, mit höchst gefährlichen Feinden der Menschheit zusammenzuarbeiten."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «Peor aún. Permite que súbditos normales del Dios Emperador crucen los límites establecidos y se rebajen a colaborar con enemigos de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Peor aún. Permite que súbditos normales del Dios Emperador crucen los límites establecidos y se rebajen a colaborar con enemigos de la Humanidad».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Daha kötü ya. Tanrı İmparator'un sıradan tebaasının, belirlenmiş çizgiyi aşmasına ve İnsanlığın son derece tehlikeli düşmanlarıyla arkadaşlık etmelerine müsaade ediyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Even worse. You permit ordinary subjects of the God-Emperor to cross the established line and reduce themselves to consorting with highly dangerous enemies of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Daha bile kötü. Tanrı İmparator'un sıradan tebaanın kurulu bir hattan geçmelerine ve kendilerini İnsanlığın son derece tehlikeli düşmanlarıyla arkadaşlık ederek küçültmelerine izin veriyorsun."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
